attributes.action: Hold a 2nd EU referendum on the basis of misleading and incorrect campaigning
attributes.additional_details:
Analysis of Leave campaign claims
http://goo.gl/vMh4cF

Nicola Sturgeon describes Leave campaign's NHS claims as "deceitful"
http://goo.gl/w8YwvF

David Cameron calls three Leave claims "untrue"
http://goo.gl/unSg0i

Leave voters change their minds after result
http://goo.gl/9Xr9Q9
http://goo.gl/9SiJbS
http://goo.gl/yVvCNJ

Nigel Farage disowns £350m for NHS claim after the result
http://goo.gl/57KWfy

Leave campaign backtracks on immigration and NHS claims after the result
http://goo.gl/2zvf8f
attributes.background:
The referendum result should be considered illegitimate after the Leave campaign retracted or denied many of the claims that were made in order to get people to vote to leave the EU. 

Many leave voters have been on the record to say they felt misled and would vote differently now.
